name: 張詠翔
objective: In this course, you will read and discuss materials on various topics and learn how to write summaries, argumentative essays and critical literature reviews that are informed, persuasive, and that conform to academic expectations. Because this course is designed to improve your academic writing skills, you will become progressively more responsible for evaluating your own work and that of your classmates.
